posts.text: 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455#include <iostream>#include <cstdio>#include <cstring>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int MAX_N = 100000; // æœ€å¤§é¡¶ç‚¹æ•°const int MAX_M = 100000; // æœ€å¤§è¾¹æ•°struct edge { int u, v, w;}e[MAX_M];int fa[MAX_N], n, m; // fa æ•°ç»„è®°å½•äº†å¹¶æŸ¥é›†ä¸­ç»“ç‚¹çš„çˆ¶äº²bool cmp(edge a,edge b) { return a.w < b.w;}// å¹¶æŸ¥é›†ç›¸å…³ä»£ç int ancestor(int x) { // åœ¨å¹¶æŸ¥é›†æ£®æ—ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ° x çš„ç¥–å…ˆï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯æ‰€åœ¨è¿é€šå—çš„æ ‡è¯† if(fa[x] == x) return fa[x]; else return fa[x] = ancestor(fa[x]);}int same(int x, int y) { // åˆ¤æ–­ä¸¤ä¸ªç‚¹æ˜¯å¦åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªè¿é€šå—ï¼ˆé›†åˆï¼‰å†… return ancestor(x) == ancestor(y);}void merge(int x, int y) { // åˆå¹¶ä¸¤ä¸ªè¿é€šå—ï¼ˆé›†åˆï¼‰ int fax = ancestor(x), fay = ancestor(y); fa[fax] = fay;}int main() { scanf("%d%d", &n, &m); // n ä¸ºç‚¹æ•°ï¼Œm ä¸ºè¾¹æ•° for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) { scanf("%d%d%d", &e[i].u, &e[i].v, &e[i].w); // ç”¨è¾¹é›†æ•°ç»„å­˜æ”¾è¾¹ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿æ’åºå’Œè°ƒç”¨ } sort(e + 1, e + m + 1, cmp); // å¯¹è¾¹æŒ‰è¾¹æƒè¿›è¡Œå‡åºæ’åº for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) { fa[i] = i; } int rst = n, ans = 0; // rst è¡¨ç¤ºè¿˜å‰©å¤šå°‘ä¸ªé›†åˆï¼Œans ä¿å­˜æœ€å°ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ä¸Šçš„æ€»è¾¹æƒ for (int i = 1; i <= m && rst > 1; i++) { int x = e[i].u, y = e[i].v; if (same(x, y)) { continue; // same å‡½æ•°æ˜¯æŸ¥è¯¢ä¸¤ä¸ªç‚¹æ˜¯å¦åœ¨åŒä¸€é›†åˆä¸­ } else { merge(x, y); // merge å‡½æ•°ç”¨æ¥å°†ä¸¤ä¸ªç‚¹åˆå¹¶åˆ°åŒä¸€é›†åˆä¸­ rst--; // æ¯æ¬¡å°†ä¸¤ä¸ªä¸åŒé›†åˆä¸­çš„ç‚¹åˆå¹¶ï¼Œéƒ½å°†ä½¿ rst å€¼å‡ 1 ans += e[i].w; // è¿™æ¡è¾¹æ˜¯æœ€å°ç”Ÿæˆæ ‘ä¸­çš„è¾¹ï¼Œå°†ç­”æ¡ˆåŠ ä¸Šè¾¹æƒ } } printf("%d\n", ans); return 0;}

posts.title: CF714A Meeting of Old Friends
posts.text: https://www.luogu.org/problemnew/show/CF714A 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;long long l1,r1,l2,r2,k;int main(void){ cin >> l1 >> r1 >> l2 >> r2 >> k; bool TNT = 0; long long minn = min(r1,r2); long long maxn = max(l1,l2); long long ans = minn - maxn + 1; if(maxn > minn) { cout << 0 << endl; TNT = 1; } else if(k >= maxn && k <= minn) ans -= 1; if(!TNT) cout << ans << endl; return 0;}

posts.title: CF719A Vitya in the Countryside
posts.text: https://www.luogu.org/problemnew/show/CF719A 12345678910111213141516171819#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int num[100],n;int main(void){ cin >> n; for(int i = 1;i <= n;++i) cin >> num[i]; if(n == 1 && num[n] != 15 && num[n] != 0) cout << "-1"; else if(num[n] == 15) cout << "DOWN"; else if(num[n] == 0) cout << "UP"; else if(num[n] < 15 && num[n] > num[n-1]) cout << "UP"; else if(num[n] < 15 && num[n] < num[n-1]) cout << "DOWN"; return 0;}

posts.title: CF712C Memory and De-Evolution
posts.text: https://www.luogu.org/problemnew/show/CF712C 1234567891011121314151617181920212223#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int num[3];int x,y,ans;int main(void){ cin >> x >> y; num[0] = num[1] = num[2] = y; while(num[0] != x || num[1] != x || num[2] != x) { sort(num,num+3); num[0] = min(num[1] + num[2] -1,x); ans++; } cout << ans; return 0;}

posts.title: CF712B Memory and Trident
posts.text: https://www.luogu.org/problemnew/show/CF712B 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;string s;int R,L,U,D;inline bool what(int num){ if(num % 2 == 0) return 1; else return 0;}int main(void){ cin >> s; for(int i = 0;i < s.length();++i) { if(s[i] == 'R') R++; if(s[i] == 'L') L++; if(s[i] == 'U') U++; if(s[i] == 'D') D++; } if(what(s.length()- 1)) cout << "-1"; else cout << (abs(R-L) + abs(U-D))/2; return 0;}

posts.title: CF708A Letters Cyclic Shift
posts.text: https://www.luogu.org/problemnew/show/CF708A 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;string s;int main(void){ int i = 0,cnt = 0; cin >> s; int len = s.length(); for(;i < len;++i) if(s[i] != 'a') break; for(;i < len;++i) { if(s[i] == 'a') break; s[i]--; cnt++; } if(!cnt) s[len-1] = 'z'; cout << s; return 0;}

258 ä»£ç 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;struct qwq{ int wyu,wshu,wying; int sum; int number; bool operator < (const qwq &w) { if(sum > w.sum) return true; if(sum == w.sum) { if(wyu > w.wyu) return true; if(wyu == w.wyu) return number < w.number; } return false; }}num[310];int n;int main(int argc, char const *argv[]){ scanf("%d",&n); for(int i=1;i<=n;++i) { num[i].number=i; scanf("%d%d%d",&num[i].wyu,&num[i].wshu,&num[i].wying); num[i].sum=num[i].wyu+num[i].wshu+num[i].wying; } sort(num+1,num+n+1); n = n while(n%a[i] == 0) { cnt++; n/=a[i]; } i++; ans *= cnt; } cout << ans << endl;}int main(){ cin >> t; prime(); for(int i=1;i<=t;i++) { cin >> n; fc(n); } return 0;} äºŒå‰æ ‘é—®é¢˜äºŒå‰æ ‘æ˜¯åŸºç¡€çš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„ï¼Œè¿™é“é¢˜åªæ˜¯è€ƒå¯Ÿäº†å®ƒçš„ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„æ¦‚å¿µã€‚ é¦–å…ˆæ˜ç¡®ä¸‰ä¸ªæ¦‚å¿µï¼Œå…ˆåºéå†ï¼Œä¸­åºéå†ï¼Œååºéå†ã€‚ å¯ä»¥ç®€è®°å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š å…ˆåºéå†ï¼Œæ ¹å·¦å³ ä¸­åºéå†ï¼Œå·¦æ ¹å³ ååºéå†ï¼Œå·¦å³æ ¹ æˆ‘ä»¬åªå…³æ³¨æ ¹å’Œå®ƒçš„å·¦å³èŠ‚ç‚¹å³å¯ï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦åœ¨æ„å·¦å³èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆè¿ç€ä»€ä¹ˆã€‚ æ¯æ¬¡æŒ‰ç…§ä¸Šé¢çš„é¡ºåºè¿›å…¥åˆ°æŒ‡å®šèŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯æ ¹åˆ™ç›´æ¥è¾“å‡ºã€‚ è¿™æ ·å¯»æ‰¾æ˜¯å› ä¸ºäºŒå‰æ ‘æ˜¯é€’å½’å®šä¹‰çš„ã€‚ è§‚å¯Ÿåˆ°å…ˆåºéå†çš„æœ€å¼€å§‹ä¸€å®šæ˜¯æ ¹ï¼Œååºéå†çš„æœ«å°¾ä¸€å®šæ˜¯æ ¹ï¼Œè€Œä¸­åºéå†å°†å·¦å³å­æ ‘ä»¥æ ¹ä¸ºä¸­å¿ƒåˆ†å¼€ã€‚ äºæ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬å°±è®¾è®¡dfså‡½æ•°ï¼Œä»ååºéå†ä¸­æ‰¾åˆ°æ ¹ï¼Œç„¶ååœ¨ä¸­åºéå†ä¸­å°†å·¦å³å­æ ‘åˆ†å¼€ï¼Œæ¯æ‰¾åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªæ ¹ï¼Œå°±è¾“å‡ºã€‚ ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š 12345678910111213141516171819202122#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;void dfs(string s1,string s2){ if(s1.size() > 0) { char gen = s2[s2.size() - 1]; cout << gen; int num = s1.find(gen); dfs(s1.substr(0,num),s2.substr(0,num)); dfs(s1.substr(num + 1),s2.substr(num,s1.size() - num - 1)); }}int main(){ string s1,s2; cin>> s1 >> s2; dfs(s1,s2); return 0; }

æ›´æ–°æœ€åä¸€æ¬¡å‡ºæ ˆçš„æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ å…¶å¯¹åº”çš„å€¼; } }è¾“å‡ºç»“æœ; ä½¿ç”¨è‡ªç„¶å°±æ˜¯ä»æ ˆé¡¶è¯»å‡ºæ¥ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ï¼Œè¯¥å…ƒç´ æ»¡è¶³å•è°ƒæ€§çš„æŸä¸€ç«¯ã€‚ ä¾‹å¦‚ä¸¾ä¾‹ä¸­å–å‡ºçš„å³æ ˆä¸­çš„æœ€å°å€¼ã€‚ ã€ä¾‹é¢˜ã€‘ ç›´æ–¹å›¾ä¸­æœ€å¤§çŸ©å½¢ç›´æ–¹å›¾æ˜¯ç”±åœ¨å…¬å…±åŸºçº¿å¤„å¯¹é½çš„ä¸€ç³»åˆ—çŸ©å½¢ç»„æˆçš„å¤šè¾¹å½¢ã€‚ çŸ©å½¢å…·æœ‰ç›¸ç­‰çš„å®½åº¦ï¼Œä½†å¯ä»¥å…·æœ‰ä¸åŒçš„é«˜åº¦ã€‚ ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œå›¾ä¾‹å·¦ä¾§æ˜¾ç¤ºäº†ç”±é«˜åº¦ä¸º2,1,4,5,1,3,3çš„çŸ©å½¢ç»„æˆçš„ç›´æ–¹å›¾ï¼ŒçŸ©å½¢çš„å®½åº¦éƒ½ä¸º1ï¼š é€šå¸¸ï¼Œç›´æ–¹å›¾ç”¨äºè¡¨ç¤ºç¦»æ•£åˆ†å¸ƒï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œæ–‡æœ¬ä¸­å­—ç¬¦çš„é¢‘ç‡ã€‚ ç°åœ¨ï¼Œè¯·ä½ è®¡ç®—åœ¨å…¬å…±åŸºçº¿å¤„å¯¹é½çš„ç›´æ–¹å›¾ä¸­æœ€å¤§çŸ©å½¢çš„é¢ç§¯ã€‚ å›¾ä¾‹å³å›¾æ˜¾ç¤ºäº†æ‰€æç»˜ç›´æ–¹å›¾çš„æœ€å¤§å¯¹é½çŸ©å½¢ã€‚ è¾“å…¥æ ¼å¼è¾“å…¥åŒ…å«å‡ ä¸ªæµ‹è¯•ç”¨ä¾‹ã€‚ æ¯ä¸ªæµ‹è¯•ç”¨ä¾‹å æ®ä¸€è¡Œï¼Œç”¨ä»¥æè¿°ä¸€ä¸ªç›´æ–¹å›¾ï¼Œå¹¶ä»¥æ•´æ•°nå¼€å§‹ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºç»„æˆç›´æ–¹å›¾çš„çŸ©å½¢æ•°ç›®ã€‚ ç„¶åè·Ÿéšnä¸ªæ•´æ•°$h_1ï¼Œâ€¦ï¼Œh_n$ã€‚ è¿™äº›æ•°å­—ä»¥ä»å·¦åˆ°å³çš„é¡ºåºè¡¨ç¤ºç›´æ–¹å›¾çš„å„ä¸ªçŸ©å½¢çš„é«˜åº¦ã€‚ æ¯ä¸ªçŸ©å½¢çš„å®½åº¦ä¸º1ã€‚ åŒè¡Œæ•°å­—ç”¨ç©ºæ ¼éš”å¼€ã€‚ å½“è¾“å…¥ç”¨ä¾‹ä¸ºn=0æ—¶ï¼Œç»“æŸè¾“å…¥ï¼Œä¸”è¯¥ç”¨ä¾‹ä¸ç”¨è€ƒè™‘ã€‚ è¾“å‡ºæ ¼å¼å¯¹äºæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªæµ‹è¯•ç”¨ä¾‹ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•°ï¼Œä»£è¡¨æŒ‡å®šç›´æ–¹å›¾ä¸­æœ€å¤§çŸ©å½¢çš„åŒºåŸŸé¢ç§¯ã€‚ æ¯ä¸ªæ•°æ®å ä¸€è¡Œã€‚ è¯·æ³¨æ„ï¼Œæ­¤çŸ©å½¢å¿…é¡»åœ¨å…¬å…±åŸºçº¿å¤„å¯¹é½ã€‚ æ•°æ®èŒƒå›´$1â‰¤nâ‰¤100000$,$0â‰¤hiâ‰¤1000000000$ è¾“å…¥æ ·ä¾‹ï¼š1237 2 1 4 5 1 3 34 1000 1000 1000 10000 è¾“å‡ºæ ·ä¾‹ï¼š1284000 é¢˜è§£å…¶å®è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€é“è´ªå¿ƒ+å•è°ƒæ ˆçš„é¢˜ç›®ã€‚ åªéœ€è¦è¯æ˜æ‰€é€‰çŸ©å½¢é‡Œé¢çš„ç›´æ–¹æ¡æ˜¯å•è°ƒå¢çš„ï¼Œè¿™æ—¶å€™å°±å˜æˆæ±‚å•è°ƒæ ˆçš„é—®é¢˜äº†ã€‚å…¶ç­”æ¡ˆå°±æ˜¯æ¯æ¬¡å¼¹å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªé«˜åº¦å°±è®¡ç®—ä¸€ä¸‹é¢ç§¯ï¼Œå–æœ€å¤§å€¼ã€‚ ä»£ç æ¼”ç¤º1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435//å®˜æ–¹æ ‡ç¨‹#include<iostream>#include<cstdio>#include<cstring> #include<algorithm>using namespace std;int n,p;int a[100010];int s[100010],w[100010];long long ans;int main(){ while(cin>>n&&n) { ans=0; posts.title: ä¹ é¢˜ 3-3 æ•°æ•°å­—(Digit Counting , ACM/ICPC Danang 2007, UVa1225)
posts.text: é¢˜æ„ç¿»è¯‘æŠŠå‰nï¼ˆn<=10000ï¼‰ä¸ªæ•´æ•°é¡ºæ¬¡å†™åœ¨ä¸€èµ·ï¼š12345678910111213141516â€¦â€¦æ•°ä¸€æ•°0~9åˆ†åˆ«å‡ºç°äº†å¤šå°‘æ¬¡ã€‚ é¢˜ç›®æè¿°PDF æ ·ä¾‹è¾“å…¥æ ·ä¾‹ï¼š1232313 è¾“å‡ºæ ·ä¾‹ï¼š120 1 1 1 0 0 0 0 0 01 6 2 2 1 1 1 1 1 1 ä»£ç æˆ‘çš„ä»£ç ï¼š12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int n;inline int find(int a){ int num[10]; memset(num,0,sizeof(num)); for(int i = 1;i <= a;++i) { char s[100010]; sprintf(s,"%d",i); for(int i = 0;i < strlen(s);++i) { int number = s[i] - '0'; num[number]++; } } for(int i = 0;i < 10;++i) cout << num[i] << " "; cout << endl;}int main(void){ cin >> n; while(n--) { int a; cin >> a; find(a); } return 0;} å®˜æ–¹ä»£ç ï¼š1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344// Digit Counting , ACM/ICPC Danang 2007, UVa1225// é™ˆé”‹#include<cassert>#include<cctype>#include<iostream>#include<iomanip>#include<functional>#include<algorithm>#include<cstring>#include<string>#include<vector>#include<map>using namespace std;const int MAXN = 10000 + 1;int C[MAXN][10] = {0};int main(){ for(int i = 1; i < MAXN; i++) { for(int k = 0; k < 10; k++) C[i][k] = C[i-1][k]; int n = i; while(n) { ++C[i][n%10]; n /= 10; } } int T, n; cin>>T; while(T--) { cin>>n; for(int i = 0; i < 10; i++) { if(i) cout<<" "; cout<<C[n][i]; } cout<<endl; } return 0;}/* 13575949 1225 Digit Counting Accepted C++ 0.016 2014-05-02 00:09:23 */

posts.text: å¦‚é¢˜æ‰€è¿°ï¼Œæœ¬æ–‡ä»…ä»…åªæ˜¯æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰è®²è§£ã€‚ æ‹–æ›´ingã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ æŒ‡é’ˆå‹12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546struct Node{ int value; Node *prev,*next;};Node *head,*tail;inline void initialize(); //æ–°é”®é“¾è¡¨inline void insert(Node *p,int val); //åœ¨ P åé¢å¢åŠ æ•°æ®valå€¼inline void remove(Node *p); //åˆ é™¤ P inline void recycle(); //é“¾è¡¨å†…å­˜å›æ”¶ inline void initialize(){ head = new Node(); tail = new Node(); head->next = tail; tail->prev = head;}inline void insert(Node *p,int val){ Node *q = new Node(); q->value = val; p->next->prev = q; q->next = p->next; p->next = q; q->prev = p;}inline void remove(Node *p){ p->prev->next = p->next; p->next->prev = p->prev; delete p;}inline void recycle(){ while (head != tail) { head = head->next; delete head->prev; } delete tail;} æ•°ç»„å‹1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041struct Node{ int value; int prev,next;}node[SIZE];int head,tail,tot;inline void initialize(); //æ–°é”®é“¾è¡¨inline void insert(int p,int val); //åœ¨ P åé¢å¢åŠ æ•°æ®valå€¼inline void remove(int p); //åˆ é™¤ P inline void recycle(); //é“¾è¡¨å†…å­˜å›æ”¶ inline void initialize(){ tot = 2; head = 1,tail = 2; node[head].next = tail; node[tail].prev = head;}inline void insert(int p,int val){ int q = ++tot; node[q].value = val; node[node[p].next].prev = q; node[q].next = node[p].next; node[p].next = q; node[q].prev = p;}inline void remove(int p){ node[node[p].prev].next = node[p].next; node[node[p].next].prev = node[p].prev;}inline void recycle(){ memset(node,0,sizeof(node)); head = tail = tot = 0;}

for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) for(int j=1;j<=m;j++) { cin>>input; map[i][j]=input-'0'; } //ä¸Šé¢ for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) for(int j=1;j<=m;j++) { if(map[i][j]>0) ans_u+=1; } //æ­£é¢ for(int j=1;j<=m;j++) { ans_f+=map[1][j]; posts.text: https://ac.nowcoder.com/acm/problem/21545 é¢˜ç›®æè¿°ç‰›ç‰›æœ‰ä¸€ç¾¤ç‰›å‹ï¼Œæ¯åªå°ç‰›éƒ½ç«™åœ¨åæ ‡è½´ä¸Šçš„æŸä¸ªä½ç½®ï¼Œè¿™ç¾¤ç‰›å‹å¾ˆå¬ç‰›ç‰›çš„è¯ï¼Œæ¯å½“ç‰›ç‰›åšä¸ªæ‰‹åŠ¿ï¼Œæ¯åªå°ç‰›éƒ½ä¼šç§»åŠ¨æ°å¥½Xä¸ªå•ä½çš„è·ç¦»ï¼Œè¦ä¹ˆå‘å·¦ï¼Œè¦ä¹ˆå‘å³ ç°åœ¨å‘Šè¯‰ä½ æ¯åªå°ç‰›åœ¨ç§»åŠ¨å‰çš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œæ±‚ç§»åŠ¨ä¹‹åæœ€å·¦è¾¹çš„ç‰›ä¸æœ€å³è¾¹çš„ç‰›çš„æœ€å°è·ç¦» è¾“å…¥æè¿°:123ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œè¾“å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•°n (1 â‰¤ n â‰¤ 50)ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºç‰›çš„æ•°é‡ç¬¬äºŒè¡Œè¾“å…¥nä¸ªæ•°pi (-1e8 â‰¤ pi â‰¤ 1e8)ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºæ¯åªç‰›çš„ä½ç½® ç¬¬ä¸‰è¡Œè¾“å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•°X (0 â‰¤ X â‰¤ 1e8) è¾“å‡ºæè¿°:1è¾“å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•° ç¤ºä¾‹1 è¾“å…¥1233-3 0 13 è¾“å‡º13 ç¤ºä¾‹2 è¾“å…¥12334 7 -75 è¾“å‡º14 è¯´æ˜12 ç¤ºä¾‹3 è¾“å…¥1232-100000000 100000000100000000 è¾“å‡º10 ç¤ºä¾‹4 è¾“å…¥12393 7 4 6 -10 7 10 9 -57 è¾“å‡º17 ç¤ºä¾‹5 è¾“å…¥1234-4 0 4 04 è¾“å‡º14 ç¤ºä¾‹6 è¾“å…¥123170 è¾“å‡º10 å¤‡æ³¨:123å­ä»»åŠ¡1ï¼šn <= 10å­ä»»åŠ¡2: n <= 20å­ä»»åŠ¡3: n <= 50 ä»£ç 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int n,x;int num[100];inline void init(){ cin >> n; for(int i=1;i <= n;++i) cin >> num[i]; cin >> x;}inline int find(){ sort(num+1,num+n+1); int ans = 1e9; for(int i = 1;i <= n;++i) { int next[100]; for(int j = 1;j <= i;++j) next[j] = num[j] + x; for(int j = i+1;j <= n;++j) next[j] = num[j] - x; sort(next + 1,next + 1 + n); ans = min(ans,next[n]-next[1]); } return ans;}int main(void){ init(); cout << find(); return 0;}

for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) dist[i] = INF; dist[1] = 0; heap.push(make_pair(dist[1], 1)); while (heap.size()) { pair<int, int> t = heap.top(); heap.pop(); if (t.first > dist[t.second]) continue; for (int i = h[t.second]; i != -1; i = ne[i]) if (dist[e[i]] > t.first + v[i]) { dist[e[i]] = t.first + v[i]; heap.push(make_pair(dist[e[i]], e[i])); } }}int main(){ memset(h, -1, sizeof h); cin >> m >> n; for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) { int a, b, c; cin >> a >> b >> c; add(a, b, c); add(b, a, c); } dijkstra_heap(); cout << dist[n] << endl; return 0;} SPFAç®—æ³•ï¼šbellman-fordç®—æ³•çš„ä¼˜åŒ–ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¤„ç†å­˜åœ¨è´Ÿè¾¹æƒçš„æœ€çŸ­è·¯é—®é¢˜ã€‚æœ€åæƒ…å†µä¸‹çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦æ˜¯ O(nm)ï¼Œä½†å®è·µè¯æ˜spfaç®—æ³•çš„è¿è¡Œæ•ˆç‡éå¸¸é«˜ï¼ŒæœŸæœ›è¿è¡Œæ—¶é—´æ˜¯ O(km)ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ k æ˜¯å¸¸æ•°ã€‚ä½†éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œåœ¨ç½‘æ ¼å›¾ä¸­ï¼Œspfaç®—æ³•çš„æ•ˆç‡æ¯”è¾ƒä½ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¾¹æƒä¸ºæ­£ï¼Œåˆ™å°½é‡ä½¿ç”¨ dijkstra ç®—æ³•ã€‚ å›¾é‡‡ç”¨é‚»æ¥è¡¨å­˜å‚¨ã€‚é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸ºæ‰‹å†™çš„å¾ªç¯é˜Ÿåˆ—ã€‚ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960#include <cstdio>#include <cstring>#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>#include <queue>using namespace std;const int N = 1010, M = 2000010, INF = 1000000000;int n, m;int dist[N], q[N];int h[N], e[M], v[M], ne[M], idx;bool st[N];void add(int a, int b, int c){ e[idx] = b, v[idx] = c, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++;}void spfa(){ int hh = 0, tt = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) dist[i] = INF; dist[1] = 0; q[tt++] = 1, st[1] = 1; while (hh != tt) { int t = q[hh++]; st[t] = 0; if (hh == n) hh = 0; for (int i = h[t]; i != -1; i = ne[i]) if (dist[e[i]] > dist[t] + v[i]) { dist[e[i]] = dist[t] + v[i]; if (!st[e[i]]) { st[e[i]] = 1; q[tt++] = e[i]; if (tt == n) tt = 0; } } }}int main(){ memset(h, -1, sizeof h); cin >> m >> n; for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) { int a, b, c; cin >> a >> b >> c; add(a, b, c); add(b, a, c); } spfa(); cout << dist[n] << endl; return 0;}

else { if(!flag) continue; mapp[i][j - flag] = mapp[i][j]; mapp[i][j] = 0; } } }}il void move(int i,int j,int flag){ swap(mapp[i][j],mapp[i+flag][j]); update(); while(reover()) update();}void dfs(int x){ if(gameover()) { for(int i = 1;i <= n;++i) { if(i != 1) cout << endl; cout << ans[i][1] <<" "<< ans[i][2] <<" "<< ans[i][3]; } exit(0); } if(x == n+1) return; copy(x); for(int i = 1;i <= 5;++i) for(int j = 1;j <= 7;++j) { if(mapp[i][j]) { if(i-1 >= 1 && mapp[i-1][j] == 0) { move(i,j,-1); ans[x][1] = i-1; ans[x][2] = j-1; ans[x][3] = 1; dfs(x+1); for(int i = 1;i <= 5;++i) for(int j = 1;j <= 7;++j) mapp[i][j] = last[x][i][j]; ans[x][1] = 0; ans[x][2] = 0; ans[x][3] = 0; } } }}int main(int argc, char const *argv[]){ n = read(); for(int i = 1;i <= 5;++i) for(int j = 1;j <= 8;++j) { int x = read(); if(x == 0) break; mapp[i][j] = x; } dfs(1); printf("-1\n"); return 0;}

bool operator < (const edge &qxq) { return s < qxq.s; }}num[1010];int main(int argc, char const *argv[]){ cin >> n; for(int i = 1;i <= n;i++) { cin >> num[i].t >> num[i].s; if(num[i].t > num[i].s) { cout << -1; return 0; } tong[i] = num[i].s - num[i].t; } sort(num+1,num+n+1); sort(tong+1,tong+n+1); long long sum = 0; for(int i = 1;i <= n;i++) { sum += num[i].t; if(sum > num[i].s) { cout << -1; return 0; } } cout << tong[1]; return 0;} æ»¡åˆ†åšæ³• AC100å»ºç«‹åœ¨50åˆ†çš„æ“ä½œä¸Šè¿›è¡Œä¸¥è°¨çš„è´ªå¿ƒè¯æ˜ã€‚ æ’åºæ¯ä¸€é¡¹æœ€æ™šå®Œæˆçš„æ—¶é—´ã€‚ å¾—å‡ºæœ€æ™šå®Œæˆçš„æ—¶é—´ï¼Œå¹¶ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªä¸­é—´å˜é‡å­˜å‚¨ã€‚ æšä¸¾ï¼Œç”¨ä¸­é—´å˜é‡å‡å»æ¯ä¸€é¡¹æ‰€è¦èŠ±è´¹çš„æ—¶é—´ã€‚ å¯¹ç»“æœè¿›è¡Œåˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸­é—´å˜é‡å°äº0ï¼Œéæ³•ï¼Œè¾“å‡º-1ï¼›å¦åˆ™ä¸­é—´å˜é‡å‰©ä½™çš„æ—¶é—´å°±æ˜¯ç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å•†äººæœ€æ™šèµ·åºŠæ—¶é—´ã€‚ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637#include<bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int n = 0;struct edge{ int t,s; bool operator < (const edge &qxq) { return s > qxq.s; }}num[1010];int main(int argc, char const *argv[]){ cin >> n; for(int i = 1;i <= n;i++) { cin >> num[i].t >> num[i].s; } sort(num+1,num+n+1); int ans = num[1].s; for(int i = 1;i <= n;i++) { if(ans <= num[i].s) ans -= num[i].t; else ans = num[i].s - num[i].t; } if(ans < 0) cout << "-1"; else cout << ans; return 0;}

= -maxx,minn = maxx;int tong[maxx];void dfs( int res , int sum , int target , int p ) { if( res == 0 ) { printf("%d", target ); exit( 0 ); } if( sum == target ) { dfs( res - 1 , 0 , target , maxn ); = sum/2; for(int i = maxn;i <= x;i++) { if(sum%i == 0) { dfs(sum/i,0,i,maxn); } } printf("%d",sum); return 0;}
